refinements.name: Bane of Fire and Thunder
refinements.desc: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by **12%**/**15%**/**18%**/**21%**/**24%**.

refinements.name: Blunt Conclusion
refinements.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to **60%**/**75%**/**90%**/**105%**/**120%** of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

refinements.name: Unbending
refinements.desc: When HP falls below **70%**/**75%**/**80%**/**85%**/**90%**, increases Charged Attack DMG by **30%**/**35%**/**40%**/**45%**/**50%** and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

refinements.name: Courage
refinements.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by **6%**/**7%**/**8%**/**9%**/**10%** for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

refinements.name: Cull the Weak
refinements.desc: Defeating an opponent restores **8%**/**10%**/**12%**/**14%**/**16%** HP.

refinements.name: Watatsumi Wavewalker
refinements.desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.12%**/**0.15%**/**0.18%**/**0.21%**/**0.24%**. A maximum of **40%**/**50%**/**60%**/**70%**/**80%** increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

refinements.name: Press the Advantage
refinements.desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by **12%**/**15%**/**18%**/**21%**/**24%** for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

refinements.name: Windfall
refinements.desc: CRIT Hits have a **60%**/**70%**/**80%**/**90%**/**100%** chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every **12**/**10.5**/**9**/**7.5**/**6**s.

refinements.name: Forest Sanctuary
refinements.desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Consciousness will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character **60**/**75**/**90**/**105**/**120** Elemental Mastery for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field. The Leaf of Consciousness' effect cannot stack.

refinements.name: Samurai Conduct
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by **6%**/**7.5%**/**9%**/**10.5%**/**12%**. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates **3**/**3.5**/**4**/**4.5**/**5** Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Lithic Axiom: Unity
refinements.desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a **7%**/**8%**/**9%**/**10%**/**11%** ATK increase and a **3%**/**4%**/**5%**/**6%**/**7%** CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

refinements.name: Oceanic Victory
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by **12%**/**15%**/**18%**/**21%**/**24%**. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals **100%**/**125%**/**150%**/**175%**/**200%** ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

refinements.name: Desert Pavilion
refinements.desc: The following effect will trigger every 10s: The equipping character will gain **24%**/**30%**/**36%**/**42%**/**48%** of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration. Multiple instances of this weapon can allow this buff to stack. This effect will still trigger even if the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Crush
refinements.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional **240%**/**300%**/**360%**/**420%**/**480%** ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

refinements.name: Bane of Storm and Tide
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by **20%**/**24%**/**28%**/**32%**/**36%**.

refinements.name: Focus
refinements.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by **8%**/**10%**/**12%**/**14%**/**16%**. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

refinements.name: Composed
refinements.desc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a **40%**/**50%**/**60%**/**70%**/**80%** chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every **30**/**26**/**22s**/**19**/**16s**s.

refinements.name: Wavesplitter
refinements.desc: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal **6%**/**7%**/**8%**/**9%**/**10%** more DMG and take **3%**/**2.7%**/**2.4%**/**2.2%**/**2%** more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

refinements.name: Frost Burial
refinements.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a **60%**/**70%**/**80%**/**90%**/**100%** chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to **80%**/**95%**/**110%**/**125%**/**140%** of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to **200%**/**240%**/**280%**/**320%**/**360%** of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Rebellious Guardian
refinements.desc: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to **20%**/**23%**/**26%**/**29%**/**32%** of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every **45**/**45**/**45**/**45**/**45**s. While protected by a shield, the character gains **12%**/**15%**/**18%**/**21%**/**24%** increased DMG.

refinements.name: Infusion Blade
refinements.desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by **6%**/**7.5%**/**9%**/**10.5%**/**12%** for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

refinements.name: Desert Watch
refinements.desc: After the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent, their ATK will be increased by **20%**/**25%**/**30%**/**35%**/**40%** for 8s. After the character takes DMG, their ATK will be increased by **20%**/**25%**/**30%**/**35%**/**40%** for 8s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is not on the field. Additionally, when not protected by a shield, the character's Max HP will be increased by **32%**/**40%**/**48%**/**56%**/**64%**.

refinements.name: Gokadaiou Otogibanashi
refinements.desc: DEF is increased by **28%**/**35%**/**42%**/**49%**/**56%**. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by **40%**/**50%**/**60%**/**70%**/**80%** of DEF.

refinements.name: Sky-ripping Dragon Spine
refinements.desc: Increases all DMG by **8%**/**10%**/**12%**/**14%**/**16%**. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does **80%**/**100%**/**120%**/**140%**/**160%** of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

refinements.name: Rebel's Banner-Hymn
refinements.desc: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by **16%**/**20%**/**24%**/**28%**/**32%**, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by **12%**/**15%**/**18%**/**21%**/**24%** and increases ATK by **20%**/**25%**/**30%**/**35%**/**40%**. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

refinements.name: Golden Majesty
refinements.desc: Increases Shield Strength by **20%**/**25%**/**30%**/**35%**/**40%**. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by **4%**/**5%**/**6%**/**7%**/**8%** for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

refinements.name: Wolfish Tracker
refinements.desc: Increases ATK by **20%**/**25%**/**30%**/**35%**/**40%**. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by **40%**/**50%**/**60%**/**70%**/**80%** for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
